article.title: Psychic Awareness Course in September
article.body:
Claire Nicholls will be holding a Psychic Awareness Course at Tranquil Spirit Studio, starting Wednesday 8 September 2021 at 6.30pm and continuing for 6 weeks on Wednesdays at the same time. Claire is a clairvoyant, tarot and palm reader who has been working in the field for over 20 years.

Explore your psychic abilities, learn about the crystal ball, palmistry, mediumship, dowsing, psychometry and much more. (It's also great fun!) It is £80 for the full course (£40 non-refundable deposit required to hold your space).

For more details, please contact either Tranquil Spirit Studio (irene@tranquilspiritstudio.com, 07941 697047) or Claire herself (clairepscychicevent@gmail.com, 01904 659979).

article.title: Reiki Healing and Aura Workshop Day
article.caption: Students at the workshop
article.body: On the 8th of February we held a workshop at the Studio, with the theme of Aura seeing and strengthening, for well-being and self-care, and how that could be combined with Reiki treatments.

article.title: New Beginning
article.caption: Room set up for a Yoga course
article.body: We are creating a new centre for alternative therapy treatments, and Reiki courses and workshops.
